com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts

Class ActionChainHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts.ActionChainHelper

  • public class ActionChainHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides helper methods to deal with Action Chains. See also schedule-options.jspf.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EXISTING_ACTION_CHAINS_PROPERTY_NAME
      Name of the parameter for existing Action Chains data field.
      static java.lang.String LABEL_PROPERTY_NAME
      Name of the form field for the Action Chain label.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void prepopulateActionChains(HttpServletRequest request)
      Adds parameters needed to display action chains in schedule-options.jspf to request.
      static ActionChain readActionChain(DynaActionForm form, User user)
      Looks in the form contents and returns a (new or existing) ActionChain iff user has selected one in schedule-options.jspf.
      static java.lang.String sanitizeLabel(java.lang.String label)
      Removes illegal characters from an Action Chain label string.
